thread.title: Christie's Blind Spot On Our Most Vulnerable
thread.title_full: Christie's Blind Spot On Our Most Vulnerable

author: Heather
title: Christie's Blind Spot On Our Most Vulnerable
text:
sharethis 10/19/15 7:00am What a week this was for thousands of poor and unemployable people with disabilities, many of whom rely on oxygen tanks and wheelchairs or suffer from severe mental illnesses -- and learned they could soon be homeless, thanks to some bureaucrats who work for Chris Christie. A state housing hardship program that had been paying mostâ€¦ Chris Christie , homelessness , housing , new jersey , Poverty , Public Housing , vouchers Comments
